card.name: Bulbasaur
card.text: 1G: Evolve to Ivysaur T: Add G to your mana pool.

card.name: Squirtle
card.text: 1U: Evolve to Wartotle Whenever Squirtle blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Charmander
card.text: 1R: Evolve to Charmeleon R: Charmander gets +1/+0 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Caterpie
card.text: 1G: Evolve to Metapod 1G, T: Tap target Pokémon.

card.name: Weedle
card.text: 1B: Evolve to Kakuna 1B, T: Put a poison counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Pidgey
card.text: 1W: Evolve to Kakuna Flying

card.name: Rattata
card.text: 2{W/R}: Evolve to Raticate First Strike

card.name: Spearow
card.text: 2{W/R}: Evolve to Fearow First Strike, Intimidate

card.name: Ekans
card.text: 2B: Evolve to Arbok When this Pokémon deals damage to another Pokémon, put that many poison counters on that Pokémon.

card.name: Pikachu
card.text: 2WR: Evolve with Thunderstone to Raichu First Strike<, Haste

card.name: Sandshrew
card.text: 1G: Evolve to Sandslash If Sandshrew would take an odd number of damage, prevent it.

card.name: Nidoran♀
card.text: 1B: Evolve to Nidorina 2B: Search your library for Nidoran♀ or Nidoran♂, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nidoran♂
card.text: 1B: Evolve to Nidorino When this Pokémon attacks, it gets first strike and deathtouch.

card.name: Clefairy
card.text: 2{W/B}: Evolve with Moonstone to Clefable. T: Add W or B to your mana pool. 2{W/B}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Pokémon. If you do, this Pokémon gains all abilities of that card, except for its Evolve abilities, until the end of the turn. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Vulpix
card.text: 1R: Evolve with Fire Stone to Ninetails R: Vulpix gets +1/+0 and first strike until the end of the turn.

card.name: Jigglypuff
card.text: 2W: Evolve with Moonstone to Wigglytuff W: Jigglypuff gets +0/+1 until the end of the turn. When Jigglypuff deals damage to another Pokémon, put that many sleep counters on that Pokémon. When Jigglypuff deals combat damage to a player, put 2 sleep counters on all Pokémon that player controls.

card.name: Magnemite
card.text: 3: Evolve with 2 Magnemite to Magneton This creature gets +1/+1. X: Search your library for a Steel Pokémon with converted mana cost X and add it to your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Magikarp
card.text: 4UR: Evolve to Gyarados

card.name: Chansey
card.text: T: Gain 3 life.

card.name: Mewtwo
card.text: Flying, First Strike, Intimidate T: Destroy target Pokémon or Trainer.

card.name: Mew
card.text: Flying Tap any number of Pokémon you control: each Pokémon tapped this way gains Indestructible until the end of the turn.

card.name: Red
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all Pokémon cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [−3]: You may put a Pokémon card from your hand onto the battlefield. [−7]: For each Pokémon you control, search your library for a Pokémon with the same name as one of the cards attached to that Pokémon, and put that card on battlefield. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Pokéball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Return target Pokémon you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put a Pokémon from your hand into play with an equal or lower converted mana cost.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your library, put a Pokémon among those cards onto the battlefield and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Stonefinder Radar
card.text: Search your library for an Evolution Stone card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Thunderstone
card.text: T: Add R or W to your mana pool. Thunderstone deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: T: Add G to your mana pool.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: T: Add U to your mana pool.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: T: Add R to your mana pool.

card.name: Moonstone
card.text: T: Add B or W to your mana pool.
